{{Wired embedded system |brand=MikroTik |model=RouterBOARD 4011 |revision=
(RB4011iGS+RM) |asin=B07HBW2NTR |price=199 |manuf_country=Latvia |is_manuf=No |manuf= |availability=now |est_release_date=08/02/2018 |fcc_date= |fcc_id= |pcb_id= |type=router |pwr_v=24 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=at |cpu1_brand=Annapurna Labs |cpu1_model=Alpine AL21400;AL21400-1400; |cpu1_cspeed=1.4 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=512 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W29N04GVSIAA |fla2=1 |fla2_brand=GigaDevice |fla2_model=GD25LQ80CSIG |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC256M16ER-EK |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=SFP+ |expansion_usb_num= |expansion_sfp_num=1 |jtag=yes |serial=yes,, console port,, RJ45 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8367SB (2x) |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=8 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=2 |flags=SFP+, PoE, |stock_boot=RouterBOOT |stock_os=RouterOS |tp_firmware= |default_ip=192.168.88.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass= |oui_eth=6C:3B:6B }} {{TagLine|Gigabit Ethernet Router with SFP+}} :[https://mikrotik.com/product/rb4011igs_rm Product page] {{â€¢}} [https://i.mt.lv/cdn/product_files/RB4011iGSplusRM_180903.png Block diagram] :''Powerful 10x Gigabit port router with a quad-core 1.4GHz CPU,'' :''1GB RAM, SFP+ 10Gbps cage and desktop case with rack ears'' *[https://wiki.mikrotik.com/wiki/MikroTik_News ''MikroTik'' Wiki] :CPU: [[Annapurna Labs]] Alpine AL21400 @1.4GHz (Quad Core) :Flash: 512MB (NAND), RAM: 1GB (DDR3), 10x GbE LAN, SFP+ ===Reviews=== *[https://habr.com/ru/post/422395/ ''MikroTik RB4011'' on '''Habr'''] (RU) *[https://viva-telecom.org/13935/mikrotik/rb4011igs-plus-rm/review/ ''MikroTik RB4011'' on '''Viva-Telecom'''] (RU) ===See also=== :;[[MikroTik]] *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD 1100AHx4 (RB1100AHx4)]] *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD 4011 (RB4011iGS+RM)]] *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD 4011 (RB4011iGS+5HacQ2HnD-IN)]] (US) __NOTOC__
